summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 36361, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of West Stevens Street under Ordinance No. 30690, and for the appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay for said improvement", approved September 13, 1916.
